data.meta_site_name: D.J. Robb Funeral Home & Cremation Centre, LTD.
data.text:
It is with deep sadness that the family of Mary Lou Woods announces her passing at home on June 9, 2023 at the age of 67. She was the loving wife of the late Doug Woods, dear mother of Tammy Atkinson (Steve), step-mother of Ryan Woods, Addi Pump (Sonya), Lee Woods, grandmother of Brittany, Eric, Jacob, Lily, Paige, Avery, Gavin and Caden, sister of Maureen MacDonald and Chris Jarvis (Jack). She was predeceased by her son Bryan De Blaere, her parents Bob and Frances Bryan, her brother John Bryan and brother in law Michael MacDonald. Cremation has taken place according to Mary Louâ€™s final wishes and there will be no services. Memorial donations made to a charity of your choice would be appreciated by the family.

The arrangements have been entrusted to the D. J. Robb Funeral Home & Cremation Centre, 102 N. Victoria St, Sarnia, ON, N7T 5W9. Memories, photographs or messages of condolence may be shared through www.djrobb.on.ca
